description:
A good for nothing saves the day, a liar gets the last laugh, and we learn the importance of names.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sannen Netarou / Saigo no Uso / Ureshi, Medetaya, Arigataya
Sannen-Netarou / The Last Lie / Happy, Splendid, Wonderful!
三年寝太郎 / 最後の嘘 / うれし, めでたや, ありがたや
